January 2014 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = CET | utc_offset1 = +01:00 | timezone1_DST = CEST | utc_offset1_DST = +02:00 | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = Telephone prefix | area_code = | iso_code = | website = | footnotes = | blank_name_sec1 = NUTS code | blank_info_sec1 = AT224 }} Südoststeiermark is a district in Styria, Austria. It was formed on January 1, 2013. This was through a merger of the former Radkersburg District and Feldbach District.(21 January 2013). Gemeindefusion: Die neue Steiermark , Kleine Zeitung (in German) ==Municipalities== Since 2015, the district has the following 26 municipalities:Die neue Gemeindestruktur der Steiermark *Bad Gleichenberg *Bad Radkersburg *Deutsch Goritz *Edelsbach bei Feldbach *Eichkögl *Fehring *Feldbach *Gnas *Halbenrain *Jagerberg *Kapfenstein *Kirchbach-Zerlach *Kirchberg an der Raab *Klöch *Mettersdorf am Saßbach *Mureck *Murfeld *Paldau *Pirching am Traubenberg *Riegersburg *Sankt Anna am Aigen *Sankt Peter am Ottersbach *Sankt Stefan im Rosental *Straden *Tieschen *Unterlamm ==References== Category:Districts of Styria Category:2013 establishments in Austria
title: Südoststeiermark District
